thread.title: Trump 'hopeful' for breakthrough at summit: Bolton

title: Trump 'hopeful' for breakthrough at summit: Bolton
text:
Trump 'hopeful' for breakthrough at summit: Bolton 10:05pm IST - 00:52
White House National Security John Bolton said on Sunday that U.S. President Donald Trump is 'hopeful' for a breakthrough at his expected summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un. Rough Cut (no reporter narration.) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
